name: Cubekiller
description:
CubeKiller is a 3D Indie third-person game that allows you to play as a cube and fight enemies of different shapes and sizes.

Your actions in-game will affect the outcome of the story, unravel the story behind CubeKiller, all in your own way.

Fun modes await you! Custom matches, endless survival, out-numbered hardcore, and much more! Fight either by yourself or with your team for the victory!Features
  • Gameplay based multi-storyline campaign
  • Endless Mode
  • Custom Matches
  • Hardcore Mode
Development Plan
CubeKiller is an Early Access game, more modes will be added and better gameplay will be improved throughout the development stage.

  • Custom Map Support
  • Steam Workshop Integration
  • Squads
  • Huge Open-World Explore Mode
  • Spectator Command, lead your team to victory!
